biotools.summary: A reference database of inferred immune receptor genes | Welcome to OGRDB - the curated Open Germline Receptor Database! | OGRDB is now accepting V- and J- sequence inferences from the human BCR light and heavy chain. Analysis scripts and submission pages have been updated accordingly
